New Short Course

Sponsored by

Can cross country racing be fun to watch? You Bet! And we're going to prove it. Our short course--designed by bike racers with 13 years of experience--will emphasize all around riding skills and showcase those skills to specators. Uniquely designed, our course brings the riders through the staging area Three times per lap! The course itself is a wild ride of technical climbs and descents with a full 70% of the course on singletrack. With expected lap times of 15 to 25 minutes, this will be an exciting race to watch and a blast to ride!
